text: Nikolai Denkov Denkov (Bulgarian: Николай Денков Денков, born 3 September 1962) is a Bulgarian politician serving as the Prime Minister of Bulgaria from 6 June 2023 until 9 April 2024. He was previously the Minister of Education of Bulgaria. Denkov is a physicist, physical chemist and chemist. He is a member of the Bulgarian Academy of Sciences and was a lecturer at the University of Sofia. He was elected a member of the Academia Europaea in 2019. ==References== Category:1962 births Category:Living people Category:Prime Ministers of Bulgaria Category:Bulgarian scientists Category:Chemists Category:Physicists Category:Members of Academia Europaea
title: Nikolai Denkov
